body.p:
Glasgow Decr 13 1860
Honl. B Magoffin
Dr Sir --

A petition will be presented to your excellency in behalf of John W. Wood Ward of Edmonton who was fined $200 at the present term of our court upon a charge under indictment of Keeping a tipling house for three months only one witness proved the fact & that very indefinitely & he was very generally intoxicated himself Said Wood Ward is a clever fellow and in bad health I hope you will remit all of Said fine except the comlth attorneys fee

Barren E & C
Metcalf Cir. Ct
$200 } Tipling
Jno. W. Moore
Issd Dec 22. 1860.
